gr.phaistosnetworks.tank

Class ByteManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.phaistosnetworks.tank.ByteManipulator

  • public class ByteManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Purpose: To perform magic tricks on bytes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteManipulator(byte[] input)
      Constructor that sets the byte array to be manipulated.

      • getNextBytes

        public byte[] getNextBytes(int length)
        Returns the next length bytes from the current byte array. There is no health check. If you request more bytes than available, boom
        Parameters:
        length - the amount of bytes to return
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the requested length of bytes

        Returns:

        Returns:
        the value of those bytes.

      • getVarInt

        public long getVarInt()
        Reads a varint from the next unprocessed bytes of the current array.
        Returns:
        the value of the varint

      • getVarInt

        public static byte[] getVarInt(long num)
                        throws TankException
        Transforms a long into a varint byte array. The implementation is based on @mpapadakis varint conversion. It is hard coded up to 5 bytes long, so it can support 32bit unsigned integers. Anything more than that and it will blow up in your face.
        Parameters:
        num - the number to be transformed
        Returns:
        the varint
        Throws:
        TankException

      • getStr8

        public java.lang.String getStr8()
        Returns a String using the str8 notation.

      • getStr8

        public static byte[] getStr8(java.lang.String data)
                      throws TankException,
                             java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Returns a byte array in str8 notation of the given String.
        Parameters:
        data - the string to encode
        Throws:
        TankException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • getStr8

        public static byte[] getStr8(byte[] data)
                      throws TankException

        Throws:
